title: Lending
name: Lending
brandDescription: Open Banking is an important strategy for financial institutions to compete and grow. Banks can collaborate with Fintechs to deliver services as features within innovative distribution channels, create unique value propositions and differentiate through personalized digital experiences.Open banking enables financial institutions to use the wealth of data at their disposal to be truly innovative – launching new partnerships, new ways of engaging customers and new revenue opportunities.

subcategories.name: retailDeposits&Loans
subcategories.description: APIs that enable the creation, maintenance and processing of retail deposit and loan accounts

subcategories.name: businessDeposits&Loans
subcategories.description: APIs that enable creation, maintenance and processing of small business and commercial deposit and loan accounts

subcategories.name: bankServicing
subcategories.description: APIs supporting functions in the back office, branch and call center

subcategories.name: risk&PerformanceMgmt
subcategories.description: APIs that support compliance, fraud mitigation and insights into financial performance

product.description: This Fiserv solution will help financial institutions offer their own open banking portal – enabling them to offer Banking as a Service, co-innovate with Fintechs, deliver financial services through exciting new channels and accelerate time to market.
